Package com.scene7.qa.benchmark

Class Summary
BaseServlet A class that holds all global objects and is extended by all servlets.
Breadcrumb  
CategoryServlet A class that handles request to view, build, reset and edit test case categories and descriptions.
Chart A class that encapsulates header information and data string used for chart rendering operating with Google Visualization API
Data structure illustration:
ChartHandler A class that handles chart rendering.
Classifier A class contains methods to categorize test cases using "category" and "description".
ConfigHandler A class that contains web server configuration parser and variables
DashboardServlet Servlet implementation class DashboardServlet
DatabaseHandler A class that holds database connection, execute and update methods.
QueryHandler A class that handles a set or predefined queries.
Reports A class to encapsulate each report's detail, such as description, SQL statement and chart type.
ReportServlet A class that handles renders result set as charts and HTML tables.
ResourceHandler A class that handles static resource and template includes.
Status A class that handles calculation of current query execution progress.
StatusServlet Serves API calls to check query execution status when running a large set of queries.
Utilities Miscellaneous helper functions used for all classes in this project.
